attributes.action: Make medical discrimination illegal and punishable
attributes.additional_details: In the past year hate crimes and discrimination towards those that make an informed choice not to take the Covid-19 injection are receiving hate and abuse equal to racism or gender abuse sufferers. In fact the UK government has also acted in this way to unvaccinated which will soon include those double jabbed.. This must stop now...
attributes.background: To make medical discrimination or medical hate crimes illegal and punishable in a court of law

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open which you might like to sign.

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
